title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same capabilities as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter enabling Ollama models as drop-in LLMs for chains, agents, retrieval, etc.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode, OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and async support; Maven Central available.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama for chat, completions, and model operations.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant with autocomplete.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Community node for n8n workflow automation; chat, generate text, or pull models inside flows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but feature-complete Rust crate exposing async/await bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# SDK for .NET 6+ with Unity examples and async streaming.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, generate flashcards, or ask questions via Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset enabling Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-llamaindex
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embedding drivers for Ollama; build local RAG with LlamaParse, etc.

title: ollama-gpu-operator
summary: Kubernetes operator that auto-scales Ollama pods based on GPU utilization and queue length.
